entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, described as having red eyes and a serpentine face. He is holding the Elder Wand.

entities.name: severus
entities.description: A character who is addressed by Voldemort, described as being blank and confused.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, whose scar begins to hurt when he hears Voldemort's tone.

entities.name: elder wand
entities.description: A magical wand that is being held by Voldemort and described as not working for him.

entities.name: ollivander
entities.description: A person who sold a wand to Voldemort in the past.

relationships.description: Harry can see Voldemort and his appearance.
Voldemort is holding the Elder Wand.
Severus is addressed by Voldemort as 'my lord'.
Harry's scar hurts when he hears Voldemort's tone.
